titleInfo.title: Leadership and administration of successful archival programs
Greenwood library management collection,; Variation: Greenwood library management collection.

mods.abstract: Contents: Leadership and archival education /; Richard J. Cox --; The art of the possible : the archivist as administrator /; Frank G. Burke --; Ways and means : thinking and acting to strengthen the infrastructure of archival programs /; Larry J. Hackman --; Strategic approaches to program building in government : from local to international and back /; Liisa Fagerlund --; Strategic planning and implementation at the National Archives and Records Administration : 1992-2000 /; Michael J. Kurtz --; Corporate culture and the archives /; Philip F. Mooney --; Archival programs in the academic library /; Lauren R. Brown --; Leadership of archival programs /; Bruce W. Dearstyne --; Building strong archival programs : insights and approaches /; Bruce W. Dearstyne.
